name: MaFl_Boboko
oralText: The perfect shields of the Bobo family are only here, in the Shield Shop of Boboku!
introText: You won't find a better armor selection in all of Flaris, I'll guarantee you that!
byeText: Tell your friends buy Bobo Family Equipment!

links.title: Who are you?
texts: Who am I? You must be joking. I'm only the most famous armorer in Flarine! I'm Boboko Bobo and I run the Bobo family Armor Shop for new Mercenaries, Acrobats and Assists.

links.title: Goodbye!
texts: Tell your friends buy Bobo Family Equipment!
